column88: Seller's Notes: Our 2006 Honda Civic Si Tuner Car is a complete one-of-a-kind Civic that was expertly constructed here at J.L. Freed. Where to begin with all the amazing features: the Honda Factory Performance (HFP) 18 alloy wheels are wrapped in 215/40-ZR18-85W performance tires. A full HFP aero kit that includes front, side and rear underbody spoilers and a Carbon Fiber Seibon MG hood lightens the overall weight. The dazzling Lambo-style scissor doors always attract a crowd. To bring this one-off Si to a stop is a set of 13 Brembro Calipers clamping down on cross-drilled rotors. Handling also gets an assist from an HFP suspension kit both front and rear. Extra power is pulled from the already potent Si engine by a HFP cat-back exhaust system. The entire exterior of this car is custom painted and pinstriped with a two-tone paint job and custom barbwire accents. The real beauty of this car is in the interior. A complete in-car entertainment system that includes a Mac Mini, a full touch-screen monitor, while the rear seating has been replaced with an amp/battery rack, and a flat screen TV. Audio is sourced through a Kenwood Receiver and plays beautifuly through a custom sound system with center channel speakers. This amazing Civic Si will make a statement wherever you go, and you dont have to worry about anyone having the same Civic as yours!

column88: Seller's Notes: This 2010 Honda Civic Sdn 4dr EX-L Sedan features a 1.8L L4 MPI SOHC 16V 4cyl Gasoline engine. It is equipped with a 5 Speed Automatic transmission. The vehicle is Grey with a Beige interior. It is covered by a limited warranty. - Air Conditioning, Cruise Control, Power Windows, Power Door Locks, Power Mirrors, Tachometer, Digital Info Center, Steering Wheel Radio Controls, Sunroof, Moonroof, Driver Airbag, Passenger Airbag, Side Airbags, Keyless Entry, ABS Brakes, Traction Control, Dynamic Stability, Rear Defogger, Intermittent Wipers, AM-FM, CD Player, Alloy Wheels,, Vanity Mirrors, Center Console, Daytime Running Lights, Tire Pressure Monitor - Contact Internet Department at 866-246-6118 or eastside@ridehomehappy.com for more information. - Q Are your salespeople really non-commissioned or is that just something you tell people? A Every single salesperson in our organization is Non-commissioned. I hate talking with commissioned salespeople...typically their focus isn't on me and what I am trying to accomplish. Typically they are focusing on the thing that will earn them the largest profit. I want my salespeople to be able to speak the buyer's language and build relationships with each and every one of our guests. Each of my salespeople are paid a salary and incentives for things way more important than money...like giving you the best buying experience ever at a dealership. Q I like you, I like your dealership and I like your prices. I don't think I can qualify for your financing. Do you have other options available? A I believe everyone should have more than one option. We have financing options for every buyer. I hate going somewhere and finding out I don't qualify for their special rates and they have nothing else for me. Each of my salespeople has been trained to help you find the rates and terms you deserve. - All of my people are trained to speak the buyer's language and build relationships with every one of our guests. Each of my salespeople is non-commissioned, which means they are paid a salary and incentives for things way more important than money...like giving you the best buying experience ever. Most people in our industry are paid commission and are trained to focus on profit instead of people.
